metadata.name: HackTool - SharpDPAPI Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the SharpDPAPI tool based on CommandLine flags and PE metadata. SharpDPAPI is a C# port of some DPAPI functionality from the Mimikatz project.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\sharpdpapi.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sharpdpapi.exe') OR (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' backupkey ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' blob ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' certificates ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' credentials ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' keepass ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' masterkeys ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' rdg ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' vaults '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' {')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('}:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /file:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /machine')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /mkfile:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /password:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /pvk:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /server:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /target:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /unprotect')))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the SharpDPAPI tool based on CommandLine flags and PE metadata. SharpDPAPI is a C# port of some DPAPI functionality from the Mimikatz project.
